# LK Digital - Dental Growth & Infrastructure

## Mission
LK Digital provides high-end digital marketing and scalable infrastructure for elite dental clinics. We specialize in transitioning boutique practices into multi-clinic powerhouses using data-driven systems and precision patient acquisition.

## Authority Pillars
- 6 years of cross-industry digital marketing expertise.
- Specialized in the Dental niche (high-ticket patient acquisition).
- HIPAA-compliant data structures and future-ready AI analysis tools.

## Key Services (Portugal/Brazil Market)
- GEO & SEO Odontológico (Generative Engine Optimization).
- Branding Boutique para Dentistas.
- Infraestrutura Digital Escalonável.

## Technical Stack
- Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, LLM-optimized semantic HTML.
